local_intent: Execute a controlled inward push along the cloth edge (180 deg, 0.1 m) after confirming visibility, yaw alignment at 90 deg, and contact; then retreat.
assumptions: Edge reachable and path clear on table
coherence_with_global: Matches GLOBAL_BT push stage using the same target, push distance and direction, and includes pre-checks (visibility, orientation 90, contact) plus retreat, consistent with the task description and recovery hints.
